content: कुच् {vI.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (कुचति, कुचित) {@--1@} To utter a shrill cry (as a bird). {@--2@} To go. {@--3@} To polish. {@--4@} To contract, bend. {@--5@} To be contracted. {@--6@} To stop, impede. {@--7@} To write or delineate. {@--8@} To mix, connect. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> कुंच् also (कोचति, कुंचति, कुंचित) {@--1@} To make crooked, bend or curve. {@--2@} To move or go crookedly. {@--3@} To make small, lessen. {@--4@} To shrink, contract. {@--5@} To go to or towards.
